games.name: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: A futuristic open-world role-playing game set in Night City, featuring a gripping narrative and immersive gameplay.

games.name: Minecraft
games.description: A sandbox game that allows players to build and explore virtual worlds made up of blocks, with infinite creative possibilities.

games.name: Fortnite
games.description: A battle royale game where players fight to be the last person or team standing, featuring unique building mechanics and a vibrant aesthetic.

games.name: League of Legends
games.description: A popular multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) game with a large player base, diverse champions, and strategic team-based gameplay.

games.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.description: An action-adventure game set in an open world, featuring exploration, puzzle-solving, and a captivating story in the Zelda universe.

games.name: Among Us
games.description: A multiplayer party game where players work together to complete tasks on a spaceship, while impostors try to eliminate the crew.

games.name: Overwatch
games.description: A team-based first-person shooter with a diverse cast of heroes, each with unique abilities, promoting teamwork and strategic play.

games.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.description: An action-adventure game set in the American Wild West, offering a vast open world, a compelling story, and realistic details.

games.name: FIFA 22
games.description: The latest installment in the FIFA series, featuring realistic football gameplay, updated rosters, and various game modes.

games.name: Call of Duty: Warzone
games.description: A free-to-play battle royale mode within the Call of Duty franchise, offering intense gunfights and a variety of weapons and equipment.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
games.description: An action role-playing game set in the Viking Age, featuring exploration, combat, and a rich narrative in the Assassin's Creed universe.

games.name: Doom Eternal
games.description: A fast-paced first-person shooter where players battle demons from Hell, featuring intense action, powerful weapons, and a metal soundtrack.

games.name: Madden NFL 22
games.description: The latest installment in the Madden NFL series, offering realistic football simulation, updated rosters, and various game modes.

games.name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
games.description: A relaxing life simulation game where players build and customize their own island paradise, interacting with anthropomorphic animal villagers.

games.name: World of Warcraft: Shadowlands
games.description: An expansion for the popular MMORPG World of Warcraft, introducing new zones, dungeons, and challenges in the Shadowlands realm.

games.name: Genshin Impact
games.description: An action role-playing game with an open-world structure, featuring elemental magic, exploration, and a diverse cast of characters.

games.name: Valorant
games.description: A tactical first-person shooter with unique characters and abilities, emphasizing team-based gameplay and precise gunplay.

games.name: Hades
games.description: An isometric roguelike action game where players navigate through the Underworld, battling mythical creatures and uncovering the story of Zagreus.

games.name: Ghost of Tsushima
games.description: An action-adventure game set in feudal Japan, featuring samurai combat, a stunning open world, and a gripping story of honor and betrayal.

games.name: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order
games.description: An action-adventure game set in the Star Wars universe, following the journey of a young Jedi as they evade the Empire's Inquisitors.
